mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.rp_id AS "rpId", a.status AS "status", a.owner_code AS "ownerCode", a.sku_code AS "skuCode", a.lot_num AS "lotNum", a.fm_loc AS "fmLoc", a.fm_id AS "fmId", a.to_loc AS "toLoc", a.to_id AS "toId", a.pack_code AS "packCode", a.uom AS "uom", a.qty_rp_uom AS "qtyRpUom", a.qty_rp_ea AS "qtyRpEa", a.rp_op AS "rpOp", a.rp_time AS "rpTime", a.print_num AS "printNum", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.org_id AS "orgId"
LEFT JOIN sys_office so on a.org_id = so.id LEFT JOIN sys_user creater on creater.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user updater on updater.id = a.update_by
mapper.select: SELECT , ec.ebcu_name_cn AS ownerName, cdws.sku_name AS skuName, cwp.cdpa_format AS packDesc, cwpr_a.cdpr_quantity AS cdprQuantity, cwpr_a.cdpr_unit_level AS cdprUnitLevel, cwpr_a.cdpr_desc AS cdprDesc, wmil.qty AS qty, wmil.qty - wmil.qty_hold -wmil.qty_alloc - wmil.qty_pk - wmil.qty_pa_out - wmil.qty_rp_out - wmil.qty_mv_out AS qtyUse, wmil.qty_hold AS qtyHold, wmil.qty_alloc AS qtyAlloc, wmil.qty_pk AS qtyPk, wmil.qty_pa_out AS qtyPaOut, wmil.qty_rp_out AS qtyRpOut, wmil.qty_mv_out AS qtyMvOut, wmla.lot_att01 AS lotAtt01, wmla.lot_att02 AS lotAtt02, wmla.lot_att03 AS lotAtt03, wmla.lot_att04 AS lotAtt04, wmla.lot_att05 AS lotAtt05, wmla.lot_att06 AS lotAtt06, wmla.lot_att07 AS lotAtt07, wmla.lot_att08 AS lotAtt08, wmla.lot_att09 AS lotAtt09, wmla.lot_att10 AS lotAtt10, wmla.lot_att11 AS lotAtt11, wmla.lot_att12 AS lotAtt12 FROM wm_task_rp a LEFT JOIN wm_inv_lot_loc wmil ON wmil.lot_num = a.lot_num AND wmil.trace_id = a.fm_id AND wmil.sku_code = a.sku_code AND wmil.owner_code = a.owner_code AND wmil.loc_code = a.fm_loc AND wmil.org_id = a.org_id LEFT JOIN wm_inv_lot_att wmla ON a.lot_num = wmla.lot_num AND a.org_id = wmla.org_id LEFT JOIN CD_WH_SKU cdws ON a.sku_code = cdws.sku_code AND a.owner_code = cdws.owner_code AND a.org_id = cdws.org_id LEFT JOIN EB_CUSTOMER ec ON a.owner_code = ec.ebcu_customer_no AND a.org_id = ec.org_id LEFT JOIN cd_wh_package cwp ON cwp.cdpa_code = a.pack_code AND cwp.org_id = a.org_id LEFT JOIN cd_wh_package_relation cwpr_a ON cwpr_a.cdpr_cdpa_pm_code = cwp.pm_code AND cwpr_a.cdpr_unit_level = a.uom AND cwpr_a.org_id = cwp.org_id LEFT JOIN cd_wh_package_relation cwpr_b ON cwpr_b.cdpr_cdpa_pm_code = cwp.pm_code AND cwpr_b.cdpr_unit_level = a.uom AND cwpr_b.org_id = cwp.org_id LEFT JOIN cd_wh_package_relation cwpr_c ON cwpr_c.cdpr_cdpa_pm_code = cwp.pm_code AND cwpr_c.cdpr_unit_level = a.uom AND cwpr_c.org_id = cwp.org_id WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wm_task_rp( id, rp_id, status, owner_code, sku_code, lot_num, fm_loc, fm_id, to_loc, to_id, pack_code, uom, qty_rp_uom, qty_rp_ea, rp_op, rp_time, print_num, remarks, rec_ver, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, org_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{rpId}, #{status}, #{ownerCode}, #{skuCode}, #{lotNum}, #{fmLoc}, #{fmId}, #{toLoc}, #{toId}, #{packCode}, #{uom}, #{qtyRpUom}, #{qtyRpEa}, #{rpOp}, #{rpTime}, #{printNum}, #{remarks}, #{recVer}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{orgId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wm_task_rp SET rp_id = #{rpId}, status = #{status}, owner_code = #{ownerCode}, sku_code = #{skuCode}, lot_num = #{lotNum}, fm_loc = #{fmLoc}, fm_id = #{fmId}, to_loc = #{toLoc}, to_id = #{toId}, pack_code = #{packCode}, uom = #{uom}, qty_rp_uom = #{qtyRpUom}, qty_rp_ea = #{qtyRpEa}, rp_op = #{rpOp}, rp_time = #{rpTime}, print_num = #{printNum}, remarks = #{remarks}, rec_ver = #{recVer} + 1, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, org_id = #{orgId} WHERE id = #{id} AND rec_ver = #{recVer}
mapper.select: SELECT wmtr.id AS id, wmtr.rp_id AS rpId, wmtr.status AS status, wmtr.owner_code AS ownerCode, ebcs.ebcu_name_cn AS ownerName, wmtr.sku_code AS skuCode, cdws.sku_name AS skuName, wmtr.lot_num AS lotNum, wmtr.fm_loc AS fmLoc, wmtr.fm_id AS fmId, wmtr.to_loc AS toLoc, wmtr.to_id AS toId, wmtr.pack_code AS packCode, cdpa.cdpa_format AS packDesc, wmtr.uom AS uom, wmtr.qty_rp_uom AS qtyRpUom, wmtr.qty_rp_ea AS qtyRpEa, wmtr.rp_op AS rpOp, wmtr.rp_time AS rpTime, wmtr.org_id AS orgId FROM wm_task_rp wmtr LEFT JOIN cd_wh_sku cdws ON cdws.sku_code = wmtr.sku_code AND cdws.owner_code = wmtr.owner_code AND cdws.org_id = wmtr.org_id LEFT JOIN cd_wh_package cdpa ON cdpa.cdpa_code = wmtr.pack_code AND cdpa.org_id = wmtr.org_id LEFT JOIN eb_customer ebcs ON ebcs.ebcu_customer_no = wmtr.owner_code AND ebcs.org_id= wmtr.org_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND wmtr.status = '00' AND wmtr.org_id = #{orgId} AND wmtr.rp_id = #{rpId} ORDER BY wmtr.rp_id
